attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are such a danger and dont bother about the safety of them selves or drivers, some of them pull out without looking. If they hit you, they have no insurance so you as a driver are left to foot the bill. They dont pay road tax so why should they have the right to go on the roads?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
